properties.entry: INSERT TABLEFLOW (CDICFILESTATUS, CUSTDATE, STARTER, INITUSERID, INITDATETIME) VALUES (:CDICFileStatus, :custDate, :starter, :initUserId, :initDateTime);
UPDATE CDICFILESTS SET STATUS = :status, CONFIRMER = :confirmer, CONFIRMDATETIME = :confirmDateTime;
UPDATE HOSTFILESTS SET HOSTDATETIME = :hostDateTime, COPYDATETIME = :copyDateTime, PROCESSUSER = :processUser, STATUS = :status;
